PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-00902001-01-230HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of ROBERT LANTOS, of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, in the place of John Adair Campion, whose term has expired.
Attachments
precis:
Appointment of ROBERT LANTOS, of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the
Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold
office during good behaviour for a term of three years, in the place of
John Adair Campion, whose term has expired.
